description:
### General

*	ElsterFormular from german financial administration provides a 
	free software for electronic tax return with encrypted electronic data transfer.

### Features

*	comfortable input with well-known UI
*	help with official instruction
*	tax calculation
*	pre-populated tax declaration
*	transfer of data of the revious year
*	plausibility check at creation and transfer
*	display of your tax data compared with your transfered data
*	secure and up to date transfer of your data over ethernet - encryption with hybrid method of RSA (2048 Bit) and 3DES (112 Bit)
*	online updates over SSL
*	paperless tax declaration and highest security with electronic certificate (require: register by 'Mein Elster')
*	hard copy of compact tax declaration
*	hard copy of transmission protocol
*	screenreader-mode for visually impaired user

### Important Notes

The income tax return for 2020 can no longer be created in ElsterFormular.
summary: Free software for electronic tax return from german financial administration.
author: Bayerisches Landesamt fuer Steuern - Dienststelle Muenchen
